text: Mikhaylo Lomonosov () is a 1955 Soviet movie directed by Aleksandr Ivanov.Кинематограф Поморья. Какими картинами знаменит архангельский Север?МИХАЙЛО ЛОМОНОСОВ (1955) It stars Boris Livanov, Asta Vihandi, and Vladimir Soshalsky. == Actors == * Boris Livanov as Mikhaylo Lomonosov * Asta Vihandi as Elizaveta Lomonosova * Vladimir Soshalsky as Shuvalov * Vladimir Belokurov as Prokop Andreevitch * Sergei Plotnikov as Archbishop * Yuri Rodionov as Popovsky * Aleksey Batalov * Ants Eskola as Rikhman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1955 movies
title: Mikhaylo Lomonosov
